page.title: 13Visiting the Leisure Centre.
page.content:
{Written by Bablu Miah (9), Richard {Davies (8) and Simon Leslie (9).}
When we went to the Leisure Centre a man called Roger gave us some safety hats to wear. we went to look at the pool - it was fantastic! When it is finished there will be a big slide like a helter-skelter with water sliding down, and a big whale in the shallow end with water coming out of its spout. We went to look at the squash courts from above and the bar, cafe and fire exit. It was a very big building with an arched roof. I can't wait till it's open because I want to slide down the slide and have a good swim.
